AppMetadata.description: The official website of the INSA Toulouse Forum, the must-attend event for students and companies.
AppMetadata.keywords: INSA Forum, INSA Toulouse, Company Forum, Student Event, INSA Contact
AppMetadata.title: Forum By INSA

NotFoundPage.title: Oops !
NotFoundPage.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.
NotFoundPage.imageDescription: The number 404 with a sunset background

CompaniesPage.title: Companies
CompaniesPage.description: Discover all the prestigious companies participating in the Forum. Meet recruiters, explore internship and job opportunities, and prepare to shine your profile !
CompaniesPage.altText: Image of a group of people discussing around a table

CompaniesList.cannotLoadCompanies: Unable to load the list of companies.

CompanyGreenLabel.description: This company offers goodies and uses eco-friendly transportation modes !

ContactPage.title: Contact Us!
ContactPage.description: You have any question or need assistance? Our team is there to help. Fill the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
ContactPage.altTextOne: Image of a person with a laptop
ContactPage.altTextTwo: Photo of people attending a conference

ContactForm.confirmationMessage: Confirmation of receipt of your message
